properties.Name: FinancialStatementDurationType
properties.Description:
The type of duration that the set of financial statements is for. 

Ex:
- Fiscal Year
- Interim Statement
- Calendar Year

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementDurationTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement Duration Type.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementDurationTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Financial Statement Duration Type.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementDurationTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Financial Statement Duration Type.
